title: 124: Bachelor Recap: Episode 9 (Pilot Pete & The Frickin’ Fantasy Suites)
itunes:title: 124: Bachelor Recap: Episode 9 (Pilot Pete & The Frickin’ Fantasy Suites)
description:
It’s Fantasy Suite recap time, Broads, and here we are shocked and surprised again. This episode had us on THE EDGE OF OUR SEATS anxious for the finale! Listen as we throw around theories, spill some tea per usual, and recap Hannah Ann, Victoria, and Madi’s date with Sweetie Scar Petey! 
MERCH:
Check out our latest merch designed by @megantimanus
https://www.teepublic.com/stores/chattybroads?ref_id=9106

*** THE REAL REAL: Go to therealreal.com (http://herealreal.com/) use promo code REAL for 20% off select items!
 
*** GRAVITY BLANKETS: Go to gravityblankets.com (http://gravityblankets.com/) and use code CHATTY to get 20% OFF! 
*** MODERN FERTILITY: Get $20 off your fertility test when you go to Modernfertility.com/chatty (http://modernfertility.com/chatty)
